attributes.action: Make Remoaners pay for the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Only those who want to be part of the EU should have to pay the costs of this poisonous organisation. Those who created 🇬🇧's biggest ever democratic mandate must not be forced to pay for their chains to this totalitarian organisation.
attributes.background: The EU elections cost 🇬🇧 £100m. and the 🇬🇧 has to pay billions a year. This cost must be met by open Remoaners whohate democracy with an extra level of tax for all MPs who have thwarted 🇬🇧's biggest ever democratic mandate. Supporters of freedom must not be made to pay for their chains.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

UK payments to the EU are made by the UK Government from money largely raised through taxation. People are taxed on their income, not their views and opinions, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256356
